title: Exactly what you make it.
text: Pros Comodo is a place where you can make as much as you are willing to work for. This shop is truly a place where if you define success in dollars, this is the right place to earn them. Advice to Management Start paying attention to internal talent- a lot of it is sitting in front of you. Do not let other firms benefit from the time, effort, and resources you put into your teams.
